scripts.build: pnpm run build:mud && pnpm run build:abi && pnpm run build:abi-ts
scripts.build:abi: forge clean && forge build --skip test script
scripts.build:mud: rimraf src/codegen && mud tablegen && mud worldgen
scripts.deploy:testnet: pnpm run build && pnpm dev:unity && mud deploy --profile=lattice-testnet
scripts.lint: pnpm run prettier && pnpm run solhint
scripts.dev:unity: pnpm run csgen && mkdir -p ../client/Assets/Resources && cp worlds.json ../client/Assets/Resources/worlds.json
scripts.deploy:unity: pnpm run dev && pnpm run deploy:unity
scripts.csgen: wait-on ./out/IWorld.sol/IWorld.abi.json && dotnet tool restore && pnpm run csBindings && pnpm run csTables
